variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter isNotNull(app_name) and not endsWith(app_name, "-cd")
| summarize cnt=count(), by:{app_name}
| fieldsRemove cnt
| sort app_name

0.content:
## Dynatrace Platform Engineering Observability Cockpit
This dashboard gives the Platform Engineering team an overview of how active and successful the platform is. Data comes primarily from **SDLC (Software Delivery Lifecycle)** Events that are [sent from Backstage, GitLab and ArgoCD to Dynatrace](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/sdlc-events).

#### Platform Adoption & Success Metrics (Created Projects, Deployed Apps, Given Feedback)

1.title: All Lifecycle Events over time split by App
1.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter contains(event.type, "app-sync")
| makeTimeseries count(), by:{app_name}

3.title: All Lifecycle Events for Selected App
3.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
// | filter event.provider == "argocd" 
| filter app_name == $application
| fields timestamp, event.type, event.status, app_name, proj_name, stage, version, owner,target_url,commit_url,deployment.externalURL
| fieldsAdd commit_url=replaceString(replaceString(commit_url, ".git", ""), "/-/commit/<no value>", "")
| fieldsAdd GitOps = if(isnull(target_url), "", else: concat("[GitOps](", target_url ,")"))
| fieldsAdd Commit = if(isnull(commit_url), "", else: concat("[Git](", commit_url ,")"))
| fieldsAdd Ingress = if(isnull(deployment.externalURL), "", else: concat("[URL](", deployment.externalURL ,")"))
| fieldsRemove target_url,commit_url,deployment.externalURL
| sort timestamp asc

5.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "backstage"
| filter contains(event.type, "create-component")
| summarize count()

6.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter contains(event.type, "app-deleted") and contains(event.status,"deleted")
| summarize count()

8.query:
fetch events
| filter source == "backstage"
| filter template == "platform-feedback"
| filter type == "feature"
| fieldsKeep timestamp
| summarize count()

9.query:
fetch events
| filter source == "backstage"
| filter template == "platform-feedback"
| fieldsKeep timestamp, event.name, type, user, `stay-informed`, feedback

10.query:
fetch events
| filter source == "backstage"
| filter template == "platform-feedback"
| filter type == "improvement"
| fieldsKeep timestamp
| summarize count()

11.query:
fetch events
| filter source == "backstage"
| filter template == "platform-feedback"
| filter type == "praise"
| fieldsKeep timestamp
| summarize count()

12.query:
fetch events
| filter source == "backstage"
| filter template == "platform-feedback"
| filter type == "bug"
| fieldsKeep timestamp
| summarize count()

14.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter contains(event.type, "app-created")
| summarize count()

15.content: #### SDLC Insights: Overall across all deployed applications

17.query:
fetch events, from:now()-7d, to:now()
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter event.type == "app-sync"
| filter app_name == $application
| summarize {
  started = takeMin(if(event.status == "started", toTimestamp(start_time))),
  finished = takeMax(if(event.status == "succeeded", toTimestamp(end_time)))
}, by: {vcs.repository.ref.revision}
| fieldsAdd duration = finished - started
| summarize avg_sync_duration = avg(duration)

18.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter contains(event.type, "app-sync") and contains(event.status,"succeeded")
| summarize count()

20.title: Validated Deployments Overview

21.title: Validated Deployments Overview
21.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "app-deployed.validated"
| summarize owner=takeLast(owner), by:{stage,version}

23.content: #### SDLC Insights: For the selected application (dashboard variable)

24.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "argocd"
| filter contains(event.type, "app-deployed") and contains(event.status,"successful")
| summarize count()
